The game questions the English nationalistic love affair with politicized traditionalism and the toxic side effects this has had on individuals and marginalized groups.

Through storytelling and allegorical visual narratives, I wanted to explore my difficult past experiences of English nationalism and identity and the history and legacy of English environments and folklore.

name: Ambrosia
summary: Take control of Flode as she journeys across the island of Cerbes and attempts to unearth the ancient relics hidden there! This is an open-ended adventure, meaning you can tackle dungeons in any order you'd like, though marching into the hardest ones first might be ill-advised...

name: Amnesia: A Coward's Debt
summary:
Your name is Jean. You are 42 years old. You live alone with your wife Evangelyne in your French estate. These are the only things you know for sure.

You awaken in your home, with no memories of the past few weeks. Your wife is nowhere to be found. Through the windows you can only see inky blackness. What’s more, you can hear something stalking the hallways of your home. And it’s getting closer.

name: Amamori Jinsei: Rain Leak Life
summary: A simple VR action game where you endure long periods of leaking rain in a leaky quadrant! Put on the VR HMD and you're in a nostalgic Japanese four-and-a-half-mat apartment. If you leave the rain leaking, you'll get yelled at by the residents on the floor below!

name: Ambroise Niflette & the Gleaned Bell
summary: In this stop-motion inspired adventure, play as detective Ambroise Niflette in the thrilling investigation of the search for the stolen bell in a mysterious village.

name: amiibo Tap: Nintendo's Greatest Bits
summary: Tap any amiibo to unlock brief gameplay highlights of classic Nintendo games. A free title for Wii U.

name: Amalie
summary: Amalie is a short and surreal RPG Maker game. It follows the story of a girl and an angel who attempts to convince her to commit suicide.

name: American Dream
summary: A game about getting rich on the stock market and interior decoration.

name: Amaryllis
summary: Amaryllis is a cute exploration RPG about a sentient flower brought to life in a mysterious world. Interact with its inhabitants through a symbolic language, deciphered using your digital magnifying glass. Fight, build, craft, and explore to uncover your forgotten origins.

name: Amaze Zer0
summary: Amaze Zer0 is a straightforward and surprisingly-difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze with calm soundtrack.

name: American Cars 'n Guns
summary: Burn some tires and pull the trigger! Just drive, drive, and shoot, shoot! In beautiful cars inspired by powerful American muscle cars! Race with friends in split screen or LAN/online mode. Reproduce races from various angles and playspeed and create memorable videos.

name: Amazo
summary: Amazo is an Adventure action game with platform elements set in the Amazon rainforest. In it, you will have to fight mysterious enemies, double jump to reach high locations and avoid falling into deep abyss. On your journey, You will have the help of a little girl and a monkey. Come on, let's go!

name: Amata
summary: Rage across the mad realms of a dead god as Charlet, the immortal artificer. Explore a vast, arcane desolation wrought by hatred. Cleanse the twisted inhabitants of ancient, forgotten worlds. Help Charlet find a way home using her powerful and varied suite of combat and platforming abilities.

name: Amanda the Adventurer 2
summary: In Amanda the Adventurer 2, the story continues as Riley encounters a mysterious masked figure after destroying the TV in the attic. Travel to the Kensdale Public Library and dig deeper into the mystery of Amanda the Adventurer.

name: American Truck Simulator: Farm Machinery
summary: Saddle up drivers, because the Farm Machinery DLC for American Truck Simulator has arrived! Transport everything from trusty tractors to forage harvesters and mobile silos across scenic virtual highways and roads.

name: A Matter of Time
summary: Wield blazing light-blades, harness the extreme power of the ‘Paradox Cape’ and plot an exciting course for an epic adventure to save the universe!

name: American Popstar: Road to Celebrity
summary:
Evolve into the greatest American Popstar!

This is your enthralling and interactive success story as a young hopeful in the music milieu. The adventure begins when you get the chance to audition at your Hollywood high school. But the road to celebrity is not a highway: your secret crush is also auditioning, and so is your evil rival. This unique mix of social adventure and music game will let you meet lots of people who may help you build your career, show your talent skills to the world, and take your best photo with the camera to the delight of your fans. You're about to be the greatest pop star in the world! Talk, share activities, and be friendly or unfriendly with numerous characters! Customize your character's name and appearance, and develop skills and personality through your actions.

name: Am I Part of the Problem?
summary: Did you hurt someone? Are you having trouble coming to terms with it? Are you unsure what to do next? Am I Part Of The Problem? will walk you through what you did, how and when to apologize, and most importantly, how to make amends.

name: Ambermoon.net
summary:
Explore a huge fantasy world with lots of interesting people, brutal monsters and all kind of magic. Visit all the islands on the home planet Lyramion and even fly to the two moons which both are home to unexpected inhabitants.

The ingame experience and game mechanics are indentical to the original game by Thalion Software but the remake allows higher resolutions, fullscreen mode, music volume, an optional cheat console, an optional graphic filter, an optional auto derune function and much more.

Of course the usability was improved a bit as well but without destroying the retro flair.

No matter if you are a fan of Ambermoon or retro games in general or if you are just someone who wants to play a lovely crafted RPG with a huge world and story, this game is exactly what you are looking for.

name: America's Funniest Home Videos: Interactive DVD Game
summary: America's Funniest Home Videos: Interactive DVD Game is a DVD quiz game based on America's Funniest Home Videos. The game is hosted by Jess Harnell and features clips from the first 17 seasons of the show.

name: Amaze Frozen
summary: Amaze Frozen is a straightforward and surprisingly-difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze with calm soundtrack.

name: Amaze Double
summary: Amaze Double is a straightforward and surprisingly-difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze with portal and gem's

name: Ambition: Strategy War Game
summary: This is a time for heroes. This is World War II. This is Ambition. Ambition gives you all the control, and allows you to focus on winning through intense strategic calculation. Don't be held back by generic rules or a lack of options - command your troops on three different maps using a mind-boggling amount of options and possible settings.

name: Amakano 2
summary: A censored console port of Amakano 2

name: Amnesia: The Dark Descent
summary: Amnesia: The Dark Descent is a survival horror video game by Frictional Games. The game features a protagonist named Daniel exploring a dark and foreboding castle, while trying to maintain his sanity by avoiding monsters and other terrifying obstructions. The game was critically well received.

name: Amagoushi no Yakata: Portable - Ichiyanagi Nagomu, Saisho no Junan
summary: This is an adventure game based on a classical mystery novel.

name: Ambulance Life: A Paramedic Simulator - Bay Side Expansion
summary: Welcome to Bay Side, a brand-new district filled with emergencies! Suit up, Paramedic, lives are in your hands!

name: Amora
summary: An indie game about a vampire that is in love with a human.

name: Ampu-Tea
summary: The surgeon-simulator inspired Tea-making game is now available on Steam! Using the latest KS-001 Robo-Arm, you must practise making various types of tea.

name: Amelie falls over and over again
summary: Masamune and Amelie are tasked with infiltrating the Caledonia Magic University. However, various schemes are swirling around the University. Unexpected struggles, a week looping through magic. Where will the story lead...

name: Ammo Bounce
summary: Ammo Bounce is a high-octane, neon-soaked twist on the classic brick breaker formula — but instead of a ball, you're bouncing a deadly buzzsaw that slices through everything in its path!

name: Amazing Katamari Damacy
summary: Roll your Katamari into a ball of galactic proportions in this cosmic endless runner. Help the Prince in this amazing adventure, collect thousands of objects, and team up with your royal cousins on a mission to restore the galaxy. Rush through lovely levels and help the King of All Cosmos to win back the Queen’s heart. Oh, and save the universe from impending doom!

name: Amagon
summary: Amagon is a Nintendo Entertainment System platform side-scroller developed by Aicom in 1988. It was subject to a high level of criticism, and never reached a high level of recognition among game critics.

name: American Truck Simulator: Mack Pinnacle
summary: The Mack Pinnacle combines power and reliability with modern technology and a classic design. A legendary workhorse, ready to take on any job. Pinnacle’s lightweight-yet-strong frame is built for heavy loads, steep grades, and long hauls.

name: Amazon Animals
summary: Amazonia Animals is a jigsaw puzzle featuring animals from the Amazon rainforest. Embark on a journey to the world's largest forest and meet endangered animals in beautiful hand-drawn 2D artwork

name: Ambulance Life: Deluxe Edition
summary: Dedicate your life to saving others. As soon as you receive the emergency call, speed off to the site of the accident in your ambulance, sirens wailing. Apply first aid and transport the seriously injured to hospital. Every second counts!

name: Amy's Greenmart
summary: Diving into the story of Amy’s Greenmart, you are to open the network of eco-friendly shops! Amy’s Greenmart is a time management game that gives you a chance to feel the atmosphere of eco-friendly shops network. Become a part of the story of Amy and Napoleon The Cat.

name: Amakano
summary: Censored Port of "Amakano".

name: Amnesia: Restored
summary:
You wake up feeling wonderful. But also, in some indefinable way, strange.

Slowly, as you lie there on the cool bedspread, it dawns on you that you have absolutely no idea where you are. A hotel room, by the look of it. But with the curtains drawn, you don't know in what city, or even what country.

name: Amber of The End
summary: Amber of The End is a strategic card-based RPG. Dong Yue, about to start his second year of university, finds himself trapped in a time loop and reliving this unusual autumn.Meet intriguing friends, build unique card decks, defeat strong enemies, and find the truth hidden at the end of this autumn.

name: AMR is for amour and also for the 12.7MM anti-material rifle + Planet X
summary: Double feature for the flesh

name: Amazing Gardens
summary:
Amazing Gardens is a casual simulation game that blends flower cultivation, creative design, and magical exploration into one enchanting experience. Grow blossoms, decorate dreamscapes, and express your style while connecting with gardeners worldwide to grow something extraordinary together.

Are you ready to start this magical gardening journey? In Amazing Gardens, a romantic encounter with nature is about to begin!

name: Amazon Passion
summary: Attacked by an Amazon, a barbarian warrior has no time to unsheathe his sword. The amazon, however, has plenty of time to unsheathe his pork sword – and hers as well! The guy had never experienced anything like this. She knew so much about manhood no woman could ever know...

name: Amanatsu
summary:
Surrounded by the blue sea and green mountains, the protagonist moved there.
For him, who has been struggling with the competitive society of the city, this is not a place to retreat, but a new battlefield.

name: Among Us: District 5
summary: Among Us: District 5 is a custom map mod for Among Us set in a biological disaster in an underground bunker.

name: American Truck Simulator: Wheel Tuning Pack
summary:
Ultimate wheel customization is here! Paint and customize your nuts, discs, hubs and hub covers exactly as you want.

Wheel Tuning Pack includes these customizable wheel parts:
19 Front Covers
24 Rear Covers
14 Front Discs
17 Rear Discs
2 Front Hubs
2 Rear Hubs
10 Front Nuts
10 Rear Nuts
Wide Rims with Dynamix Heavy Duty Tyres

name: Amelia's Garden
summary: Repair these pots and start a brand new rooftop garden!

name: Amagami GS
summary:
On Christmas Eve, behind the festivities of the Founder's Festival.
In the background of the Christmas Eve festivities, preparations were being made with an eagle eye for what would become known as the "Backstage Founding Festival".
What is the purpose of this backdoor founding festival?
I was invited by no one, and ended up alone at the campfire.
In the end, the protagonist is left alone to watch the campfire.
He is lonely at heart.
In the end, he was left alone to watch the campfire. The lonely protagonist was greeted by Umehara, who looked as if he had made up his mind. ......

The heroines of "Amagami" are all here.
It's a fully voiced, gorgeous ensemble comedy that finally opens!

name: Ambush: Convoy Strike
summary: Deploy unique and powerful unmanned military turrets and stop the advancing enemy convoys!

name: Amapani!
summary:
Amapani! the name is short for Alice, MArisa, PAtchouli and NItori, is a 2D action platformer developed by Desunoya where up to four players are able to play simultaneously on screen.
While it is possible to play alone, the game also supports online features.
The basic gameplay premise is very similar to Super Mario series, however, Amapani! involves cooperation between four characters with different abilities in solving light puzzles, defeat enemies, open platforms, reach the exit and boss battle at the end of each stage. The game also includes extra stages with greater challenges and harder difficulties.

name: America's Army 3
summary:
America's Army fans and new players alike can now experience America's Army 3, the official U.S. Army game, which has more authentic military elements including training, technology, weapons, and audio than any other military game.

Built on Unreal Engine 3, AA3 delivers stunningly realistic characters, environments, lighting effects, animations, and team-based experiences. In the game where Every Detail Counts, players are bound by Rules of Engagement (ROE) and gain experience as you navigate challenges in team-based, multiplayer, force-on-force operations. With 15 different map/mission combinations and exclusive advanced training that allows you to unlock new abilities and customize your gear, you'll experience Soldiering in the U.S. Army like never before.

Find strength like no other in a game like no other. Start your mission now.

name: Amabilly
summary: Amabilly is a lovely girl who loves rock 'n' roll, and this story is about her greatest adventure! With her favorite guitar as a weapon, she faces strange creatures and even the greatest of the challenges! It's time to Rock!

name: Amneron's Legacy
summary: Amneron's Legacy is a classic style RPG PC game that takes place on a world called Ellis. Heroes must come together to save the realm from darkness while uncovering what happened to the heroes of old.

name: A Midlevel Dog
summary: A middle-aged mid-level corporate dog is having a mid-life crisis in a surreal dog-eat-dog world. Did I mention that the world is populated by dogs?

name: American MILF
summary: Cover their stunning bodies with your cum and enjoy watching them react passionately to your climax. American MILF – VR Adult Experience

name: Amphibia: Locust Pocus
summary: Browser game based off the tv show

name: A Maiden Astrologer Divines the Future
summary: This work is an adventure game that you can enjoy about an astrologer named Izumi who feels happy and rewarded when "making someone happy" or "being able to support someone".

name: Amshay
summary: Strategically drop beautiful gems and ugly blobs in an addictive pursuit attempting to capture 100 hideous freaks! Play solo or with a partner in couch co-op. Chase high scores in endless or time attack modes. If you love dropping blocks and making crush, you'll love Amshay!

name: Amber Isle
summary: Welcome to Amber Isle - a quaint, friendly village of prehistoric residents who are in need of a new shopkeep... That’s you! Craft and sell items, upgrade your shop, befriend your Paleofolk neighbours and customise the island to bring the village back to life and welcome even more prehistoric pals!

name: Ame no Marginal -Rain Marginal-
summary:
The latest visual novel by Tomo Kataoka, the author of Narcissu 1st & 2nd, has arrived!

An empty world with endless rain and only one person.
Here there is no hunger, sickness or even death.
Just what story does this world's one occupant have?

name: Amigo pancho
summary:
Help Amigo Pancho to get to the Mountains top.
Pancho loves going to the highest places in the world! And he does it in an unusual way: by holding on to two small balloons. What is interesting about the game?

name: Amira: Name in the Dark
summary: AMIRA is a psychological horror game in which a grieving father tries to uncover what happened to his family. During his investigation, he stumbles upon horrific secrets from both the past and the present.

name: Ameagari no Hanaby
summary: Ameagari no Hanaby is a single-player 2D-action game with fireworks as a theme.

name: Amazon Warrior
summary: You have to find a way through the Amazonian jungle while fighting bats and spiders (among other things).

name: Amazing Frog Simulator City
summary:
Amazing Frog - Simulator City is a amazing openworld Game of bonkers physics sandbox frog simulator game. Discover the Frog City and you can search and do a lot things ! Such as You can drive car And trucks , Swimming on the pools .Shot fire on others , climb and jump from buildings and a whole lot more !

You manage a amazing frog that insanely curious and fun loving. Home is your goal in Amazing Frog - Simulator City - it is an endless search for insanity in a big city filled with a variety of easter eggs, interesting amazing frog characters, strange structures, etc.

-------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------
If you like our game and give us positive review and feedback we will add more features in next updates !

Positive Reviews mean a lot for us ! If you like this game don't hesitate to give nice review .. if we see positive feedback that will encourage us to add new features and improve the game !

name: Amazing Adventures: The Lost Tomb
summary:
You are an adventure seeker who travels the world in search of forgotten & lost treasures. Search for hidden objects and circumvent unique puzzle traps to recover the most sought after treasures the world has ever known.

A newly-discovered fragment of an ancient map is believed to reveal the location of the Lost Tomb of Egypt. Under the direction of the Museum, you must immediately begin your adventure to locate the Lost Tomb and the treasures locked within! Complete over 100 levels by finding hidden objects and circumventing unique puzzle traps. Good luck on your adventure.

name: Ameshidama
summary: This is a horror adventure game where you guide a lonely girl into the outside world. The girl is stuck in a small room, alone and unable to go outside. She dreams of the outside. What is outside? Why can't she go outside? Even after learning the reason, will you still take her outside?

name: Ambrosia Sky
summary: You are Dalia, a deep-space disaster specialist dispatched to the rings of Saturn. You’ll lay victims to rest, clean up alien fungus, and research its strange origins. Adapt to survive, cleanse the contamination, and escape the crisis.

name: AmourVortex
summary: Amour Vortex is an indygame we made for the wedding of our beloved friends Mel&Ben. Developed in secrecy for about 4 months, under the groom’s nose, it remained a total surprise. This co-op action plateformer covers their first date, the mariage and their quest to get back a bunch of shared memories.

name: American Car Parking Simulator 2025
summary: Park Like a Pro. Drive Like an American.

name: Amatsuko
summary: A knowledge-based progression game. Explore and solve the strange misteries of the interconnected fantasy worlds trapped inside an esoteric book and discover the roots of a terrible evil. No stats, no log, no savefiles. Only pure knowledge is your progress.

name: Amadeus: A Riddle for Thee - Episode 1: Waltz
summary: Amadeus: A Riddle for Thee is a linear narrative Visual Novel + Adventure game, heavily inspired by Umineko When They Cry thematically, and Professor Layton aesthetically.

name: A Merchant's Promise
summary: Physics-Based Medieval Trading & Transport Simulator. Start as a Worthless Merchant and work your way up as you carefully handle and transport your goods through a stylized Medieval World!

name: Amelia's Diner
summary: Help Amelia to run her diner and serve delicious food and make your customers happy!

name: American Truck Simulator: JCB Equipment Pack
summary: Experience the power and versatility of JCB machinery as you tackle challenging construction and agricultural projects across the USA. From powerful excavators, fully electric machines, and power generators to rugged loaders, each JCB machine offers a unique blend of performance and precision.

name: Among Ashes
summary: Among Ashes is a terrifying first-person survival horror game. Your friend has sent you a link to a game that someone posted online, but as you play you quickly realize that something is terribly wrong. Whatever you do… KEEP PLAYING

name: Amanatsu+
summary: A story of adventure and young love by fan-favorite developers AZARASHI SOFTWARE. The protagonist returns to his nostalgic yet somewhat unfamiliar hometown, reuniting with past friends, stirring old feelings, and even finding love over the course of this fleeting summer's dream.

name: Ampersat
summary: A shooty, slashy, RPG-y game mixing retro and modern sensibilities. A blend of influences from Gauntlet & Smash TV to Zelda & Angband, battle ASCII creatures in colorful areas & free letters to return language to the village.

name: A Matter of Caos: Episode 3
summary:
After so many dangers and meetings, Mister Gilbert is left with much more questions than before, and even less answers. 
Now the truth is near! Force your way through dangerous cults, old relics and eventful jailbreaks to find out the truth: where is Daphne? Why did she disappear? What is going to happen in the dark and creepy city of Mavropolis?

name: Amity x Li
summary: Amity Watkins and her girlfriend Li Anderson are seniors in high school in the smallish, obscure town of Foxville, Massachusetts. It's Saturday, only five episodes of Sailor Moon Crystal have been released, and Amity wants to give Li a flower pendant. A Twine story about two girls in love, chatting about life.

name: American Journey Solitaire
summary: Wyatt, a small-town lumberjack, is swept into a spontaneous road trip to Hawaii by his thrill-seeking best friend. As their journey unfolds, play through 300 solitaire levels, overcome obstacles, and unlock bonuses, all while enjoying a lighthearted story filled with unforgettable stops.

name: A Moderately Uncomfortable Night with Tux
summary:
You have woke up in a mysterious office -- and Tux from Linux is after you.

Armed with malfunctioning doors and a laptop with a barely functional battery, you must survive to 6 AM while Tux's gang tries to taint your PC. If they fully taint it.. well, something bad will happen.

Beware Tux...

name: Amaze Valentine
summary: Amaze Valentine is a straightforward and surprisingly - difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze with romantic art and calm soundtrack.

name: Ambition Record
summary: Raise the song of victory in a fantasy RPG and experience true dragon power!

name: Amaz'd
summary: 2D fast-paced, pixel-art roguelike dungeon crawler. Battle through procedurally generated mazes, slay monsters and bosses, Your score passively ticks down, so clear the maze as quickly as possible! Can you win and a-maze me?

name: Amazon
summary: The NSRT (National Satellite Resource Technology) has sent a team to the Amazon rainforest but there has been no communications with the team for some time. It's now your job to go and find out what happened to them.

name: American Pool
summary:
With American Pool, publisher Mud Duck brings a budget-priced virtual 3D billiards presentation with three modes of gameplay to the PlayStation. In Training mode, players learn the controls and various pool techniques by solving tasks and problems, while Pocket Game mode offers five types of pool including 9-Ball, 8-Ball, Basic, Rotation and 14-1 Rack. The final mode, Pool Contest, is a 9-Ball bracketed tournament in which players create their own character and level up with special shots and techniques as they advance through the pairings.

Examples of special skills that can be earned include Low Tech (adds a visual line from the cue ball to facilitate aiming), Easy Shot (drops the speed of the power gauge by one-third), and Free Ball (allows the cue ball to be placed in any location). As players reach higher levels of skill, additional abilities are unlocked. Specific conventions used in American Pool include "Texas Express Rules" in 9-Ball games, the requirement to "call your shot" in 8-Ball, and the loser of banking in 14-1 Rack taking the break shot.

name: Amon
summary:
Follow Amon, the God of Air, on his quest to connect a world of puzzling optical illusions using Virtual Reality.
Look around, move around and play around with ancient 3D scanned sculptures from museums around the world.
Be sure to put your headphones on when putting together the historic pieces, as Amon is built with Binaural Audio to help you solve the puzzles.
It will be an epic journey that moves you. Literally.

name: American Catur
summary: If “chess is the gymnasium of the mind,” as French scientist and philosopher Blaise Pascal once said, then I say "American Catur is the Full-Distance Ironman Triathlon of the mind" CEO Eric J Curtis. We have two fundamental tactic offensive and defensive bombs controlled with a roll 6 & 8 sided die

name: Among Us: Crewmate Edition
summary:
Play online with 4-15 players as you attempt to hold your spaceship together and return back to civilization. But beware... as there may be an alien impostor aboard!

The Crewmate Edition includes:
- Base Game
- DLC items: Airship, Polus and MIRA HQ Skins, and Hamster Pet, Bedcrab Pet, Brainslug Pet, Stickmin Pet, and Mini Crewmate bundles
- 3D Lenticular Case
- Impostor Syndrome Sticker Sheet
- 1 of 12 Special Mira HQ Holographic Access Cards
- Folded Skeld Map Poster designed
- Redeemable Code for 6 PC/Phone Wallpapers

name: Amalgoom
summary: Amalgoom is a megawad project based on the theme of making brand new levels by combining together maps from Doom & Doom II. The project is a homage to the original games and its creators.

name: Among Us: Ejected Edition
summary:
Among Us: Ejected Edition includes:
- Among Us base game and all of the DLC items
- Retail Exclusive "Innersloth Cosmicube": featuring cosmetics from prototypes we made that never became full-fledged games
- Limited Edition SteelBook
- Impostor Syndrome Sticker Sheet
- 1 of 12 Special Mira HQ Holographic Access Cards
- Folded Skeld Map Poster designed
- Redeemable Code for 6 PC/Phone Wallpapers
- Crewmate vs Impostor Lanyard
- Purple Crewmate Plush
- Spinning Into Space Enamel Spinner Pin
- Crewmate Fleece Blanket (60" x 90")
- Red Impostor Beanie (6" x 6" x 5")
- Limited Edition Ejected Edition Box

name: Among the Innocent: A Stricken Tale
summary: Among the Innocent is a first-person adventure thriller that takes place on an abandoned farm in the eastern Free State, South Africa. The gameplay is inspired by classic point-and-click adventure games, and is packed with intrigue, puzzle-solving, and exploration.

name: America's Most Eligible: Book 2
summary: America's Most Eligible: All Stars is the second book of the America's Most Eligible series. It is alternatively known as either America's Most Eligible, Book 2 or America's Most Eligible, Season 11. It succeeds its first book, America's Most Eligible: Season 10, and is followed by America's Most Eligible: Wedding Edition.

name: A Musical Story: Digital Deluxe Edition
summary: A Musical Story Digital Deluxe Edition includes: A Musical Story Full Game, Official Soundtrack and exclusive Artbook and Wallpapers not available outside of the Deluxe Edition.

name: Amanda's Sticker Book 2: Amazing Wldlife
summary: After winning her first sticker book competition, Amanda has her eyes set on even greater heights. Help Amanda create award-winning sticker books. Swap stickers, earn power-ups and clear each puzzle to make Amanda's new dream come true.

name: Amazon: Guardians of Eden
summary:
Amazon is a movie adventure game about a 1957 expedition into the heart of the Amazon basin: "a desperate, crazed message sends [the player] on a perilous search through a land where legends come to life, danger hides behind every corner, and incredible treasures wait to be discovered."

It is one of the first games to feature super VGA graphics, digitized voice-overs, and an online hint system.

name: Amazon Rush
summary: Enjoy the unique world of adventure and challenges. "Amazon Rush" is an infinite running game with lots of thrill and fun. This running game is beautifully designed with 2D pixel art with fascinating background and awesome sound effects. The game is so exciting and interesting that you can play this game anytime you want irrespective of time and location.

name: American Truck Simulator: Space Paint Jobs Pack
summary: To celebrate the 50th anniversary of the Moon Landing, we are releasing a very special Space Paint Jobs Pack for American Truck Simulator, including a few unique accessory items for your truck cab. We are sure it'll make your rig look out of this world.

name: A Modest Legacy
summary: Welcome to A Modest Legacy, a medieval, real time strategy game. Here you will use city building and combat tactics to conquer your enemies in hopes to be the last kingdom standing. Good luck!

name: American Chopper
summary: Be hired into the shop of the hit TV series American Chopper. Here's your chance to ride the bikes built by the Teutuls. Choose from the POW/MIA Bike, Jet Bike, Black Widow Bike, and others. You're also sent on missions to create your very own, original themed chopper that rivals those built by Paul Sr. and Paul Jr. Experience first-hand all of the hard work, drama, and thrill of creating one of the most beautiful bikes on the road today.

name: American Chopper
summary: Be hired into the shop of the hit TV series American Chopper. Here's your chance to ride the bikes built by the Teutuls. Choose from the POW/MIA Bike, Jet Bike, Black Widow Bike, and others. You're also sent on missions to create your very own, original themed chopper that rivals those built by Paul Sr. and Paul Jr. Experience first-hand all of the hard work, drama, and thrill of creating one of the most beautiful bikes on the road today.

name: Amelie
summary: A psychological mystery yuri visual novel about a girl named Amelie. Forbidden from leaving the house, Amelie awaits the arrival of her long time penpal, Sofia, to her dear friend Lilika’s dismay. What secrets will Sofia unravel that were best kept buried?

name: Amaranthine Voyage: The Living Mountain - Collector's Edition
summary:
A brilliant but misunderstood professor, you've been to the Tree of Life, and lived to tell about it. Only no one will believe you. Your students have even begun to make fun of you… Until an elderly gentleman shows up at your door, and your whole life changes once again.

Are the Three Stones really a portal to another world? Find that out and more as you follow your colleague's trail to track down the truth of his strange disappearance. Explore beautiful, strange worlds, and watch out for surprising twists that will leave you wondering. If the tiara fits…

name: Am Madness
summary:
Your Omega protection has been stolen. Attempt to escape the first signs of madness, in a hard, unforgiving, 2D platformer. Inspired by classics such as Manic Miner and Jet Set Willy, with a modern twist. Face the darkness, escape The Madness.

Features:
28 levels of The Madness: 9 normal, 9 dark curse variations, 9 madness variations and a hidden level for those who enjoy the rain!

A haunting soundtrack by "Last Child Left", including his beautifully melancholy "Moonlight Sonata" remake!

Retro inspired gameplay with some comforting modern additions.

Face The Madness on three distinct difficulty modes:
Easy Difficulty - Face The Madness with two lives but gain an additional life after each level completion, until you reach the dark curse level variations

Normal Difficulty - Face the madness with three lives and escape both normal and dark curse level variations

Madness Difficulty (unlocked by beating The Madness on normal difficulty) - Face The Madness with just one life and play through The Madness level variations

name: American Railroads: Summit River & Pine Valley
summary: Buy - Transport - Profit: Arrange your own 1800s steam train, load it with timber logs and deliver it to the local sawmill while enjoying the realistic driving- and physics experience in a majestic mountain scenery.

name: Amaranthine Voyage: The Orb of Purity - Collector's Edition
summary:
From Eipix Entertainment, the studio that created Danse Macabre and Phantasmat, invites you to explore a new world in the next Amaranthine Voyage!

Professor Samantha Bennett has made a huge breakthrough in her harmonium research, but is shocked when a man from another world falls through her new portal. The man calls himself Kraixx and appears to be ill, pleading with Prof. Bennett to save his world. Since you're the leading expert on harmonium, Prof. Bennett calls you in, hoping you can save this strange man's life and uncover the mysteries of the dark harmonium threatening to swallow Kraixx's world. Search this new world for clues, but beware the Watchers, a cold-hearted group whose goal is to arrest anyone with magical abilities, including Kraixx. You'll have to decide who to trust in this new world where anything is possible.

name: American Ninja Warrior: Challenge
summary:
Are you the next America Ninja Warrior? 
Begin your quest to achieve Total Victory with the action-packed obstacle course competition game, American Ninja Warrior Challenge! Do you have the strength and endurance to jump, swing, and sprint your way to hitting the buzzer at the end? Race against the clock with your friends and family while testing your skills in couch multi-player or take on the challenging career mode. Those who successfully complete the city courses move on to the finals will face a stunning four-stage course modeled after the famed Mt. Midoriyama in Japan. Enjoy all the thrills and spills to become the next American Ninja Warrior! 
Features 
 
• Take on classic obstacles such as the Salmon Ladder, Warped Wall, Log Grip and more! 
• Build your own custom course and have your own personalized Ninja race through it 
• In-game commentary voiced by the TV show hosts Matt Iseman and Akbar Gbajabiamila 
• Offline multi-player & online leaderboards

name: America is Doing Great
summary:
A post-apocalyptic role-playing game. Escape enslavement in the barren remnants of Colorado, centuries after the ice caps melt. America is a flooded, war-ravaged shell of its former self... and it's doing GREAT!

Two centuries have passed since we flooded the Earth.

For decades, humans struggled to survive, clustered on the new archipelagos, committing violence over what crude oil and arable land remained. The United States collapsed and was divided among the world's remaining nations.

You are forced by threat of enslavement to flee your home on the coast of Kansas, driven into the devastated, lawless remnants of Colorado. Stranded with no home to return to...

name: Amethyst Hearth
summary:
It's been your family tradition to go to that one farm and buy that one Christmas tree.

This year, some jerk sent her huge robot to buy it.

After a huge argument, you let the robot take the tree and you storm off.

But then, the robot shows up at your doorstep, fighting against his programming to secure the tree just to give it to you.

You talk to the robot, and start to get to know him better.

Where will this lead? Who knows.

But one thing is for certain: your Christmas won't be so lonely this year...

name: American Bass Challenge
summary: Hook up with the biggest bass in this ultimate rod n' reel challenge. The most thrilling fishing experience you'll get on 32 bits!

name: American FKN Election
summary: American FKN Election is a clicker game in which you click on your favorite politician and get handsomely rewarded! Between 2 and 12 hours, you get a dollar bill of multiple rarities. The dollar bill drops will change once every 7 days. Join our community and collect them all!

name: Among the Heavens
summary: Up in the sky in a fantasy world, two friends Cid and Markus decided to bring an old tavern back to life in Among the Heavens!

name: American Truck Simulator: Kenworth T680 2022
summary: The moment we've all been eagerly waiting for is finally here! We're thrilled to announce the release of the much-anticipated Kenworth T680 100 Years Anniversary Edition for American Truck Simulator.

name: A Million Conquests
summary: Experience the thrill of a shmup game like the arcade classics. With just the right amount of story, lots of action, and many, many bullets.

name: America Against Ants
summary: The year, 1951, the place, Nevada, USA. Take command of Task Force Sable and battle through 30 increasingly challenging missions to defeat giant, mutant ants as they swarm from atomic test sites in the desert. AAA features a unique, narrative driven blend of tower defence and real time tactics.

name: AMFM
summary:
a dimension-hopping & contraption-building game_ anomalous multiverse, Fleeting Machinations_

A biologic supercomputer banished to a lead planet called the "enigma core" awakes from its restless slumber to turn the fabric of reality into an unmaterial broth of pain and suffering. You control a minimum wage school cleaner. Take care of this mess I created.

name: Amerzone: The Explorer's Legacy
summary: Amerzone is a first person adventure, similar to Myst, using 360º vision, movement and point & click interface. It's the first adventure game from the author of Syberia and Syberia 2, Benoît Sokal, presenting very rich scenarios and more than 50 puzzles to solve and 200 locations to visit.

name: Amid Evil VR
summary: A retro FPS for the ages! Completely rebuilt from the ground up for VR! Once branded a heretic, now you have been chosen as our champion! Reclaim our sacred weapons. Take back our ancient lands. If you can stand... Amid Evil.

name: Amaze Classic: Inverted
summary: Amaze Classic: Inverted is a straightforward and surprisingly difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze with abstract art and a calm soundtrack.

name: Among Us
summary:
Play with 4-15 player online or via local WiFi as you attempt to prepare your spaceship for departure, but beware as one or more random players among the Crew are Impostors bent on killing everyone!

Originally created as a party game, we recommend playing with friends at a LAN party or online using voice chat. Enjoy cross-platform play between Android, iOS, PC, and console.

name: Ambulance Emergency Simulation
summary: New case information is constantly coming from your radio, you should pick up the patient and take him to the Hospital as soon as possible.

name: American Truck Simulator: Arizona
summary: The Grand Canyon State welcomes you! Drive through the streets of its largest city and capital, Phoenix, and discover the distinctive southern centers Flagstaff and Tucson. Enjoy the sweeping, ever changing scenery of this corner state - hypnotizing deserts, endless forests, deep canyons and wild mountains. Cross the Colorado river over unique bridges and explore many wonderful vistas and famous landmarks within this region. This is a free add-on.

name: American Football
summary: American Football is a sports simulation game for two players only. The action starts with a kick-off, after which the side receiving the ball tries to run down the field avoiding being tackled by the defensive team. The offensive team runs interference. The ball may be passed between players, or kicked towards the goal line. After a tackle, the offensive team goes into a huddle, a "play" is picked, and the quarterback receives the ball and tries once again to break through the defensive line. During play, the team members can all be moved at once, or individuals may be moved separately.

name: Ambien
summary: AMBIEN is a mod for Omori that is largely focused on expanding the blackspace area of the game. It has a new storyline, over 70 unique maps and two endings.

name: American Horseshoes
summary: Each player can choose from one of four characters: Lucky Lou, Diamond Dave, Tossin' Tom and Mayhem Mary. There are two pitches in each inning. Players may select grip and throwing angle prior to each pitch. The rolling of the trackball determines the distance of each pitch. After each inning the scoring with shown with an overhead shot of the stake area. Each player's score is shown throughout the game at the top of the screen. Up to nine innings can be played per game.

name: American Truck Simulator
summary: American Truck Simulator puts you in the seat of a driver for hire entering the local freight market, making you work your way up to become an owner-operator, and go on to create one of the largest transportation companies in the United States.

name: Among the Trolls
summary: Among the Trolls is a first-person, survival, action-adventure game where the strange mysteries of Finnish forests are unraveled. Embark on a quest to find your vanished grandparents and learn how to survive in the wilderness.

name: Ambidextro
summary: A witch has kidnapped the prince and princess. As a royal wizard, it is your mission to rescue them both at the same time, but first you will have to learn to control your two bodies simultaneously.

name: Amer Fighting
summary: Get ready to rumble in Amer Fighting, the ultimate party fighting game where the fun never stops! Gather your friends and dive into an exciting family fight for up to 6 players as each battle is a chance to become a legend! In Amer Fighting, everyone can fight, but only one can win!

name: Amazing Frog?
summary:
Amazing Frog? is a Hardcore Parkour openworld buffet of bonkers physics sandbox gameplay.
Welcome to the town of Swindon, SwindonShire. Home to flatulant super hero, Amazing Frog?
a 20Km Landscape A whole bunch of vehicles 4 player split screen Oculus VR support. Pigging backs… and pigs ridiculous ragdolls, trampolines, cannons and explosions Weapons like crossbows lasers and machine-guns Vicious Sharks Swimmming ish and Boats in the ocean Fully fitted Fart Gym Underground Zombie Frogs in the Sewers A Giant chessboard A bunch of test rooms and a whole lot of mystery...

name: Among the Stones
summary:
Among the Stones follows a brave, young adventurer as she explores a mysterious island with the aid of its friendly stone inhabitants. This 3D platformer allows the player to carve their own path with its creative stone building mechanics, solving puzzles and uncovering secrets on the way.
The game features friendly characters and peaceful environments with fun platforming and logic challenges. Creating a captivating vibrant world to be enjoyed by young player adventurers.
Developed by Bluedoor Games, a team of 3rd year students at Abertay University, their prototype of the game saw a welcoming reception at Dare to be Digital. The project won a nomination to receive BAFTA (British Academy of Film and Television Arts) Ones To Watch award, and is currently in further development.

name: Amber Alert
summary: Step into the shoes of a policeman in "Amber Alert," a survival horror game. Responding to a late-night call, you find a sinister cult of women abductors. Your mission: rescue a captive girl. Navigate perilous streets, evade cult members, and survive.

name: Amaze Gears 2
summary: Amaze Gears 2 is a straightforward and surprisingly-difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze with traps, timer and cool soundtrack.

name: Amnesia: A Machine for Pigs
summary: From the creators of Amnesia: The Dark Descent and Dear Esther comes a new first-person horrorgame that will drag you to the depths of greed power and madness. It will bury its snout into your ribs and it will eat your heart.

name: Amped: Freestyle Snowboarding
summary: Rip the ultimate line on wide-open, real mountains packed with challenges. Whether you hit the cliffs, grind fallen trees, jib the rainbow tree rail, or take the hidden paths, you decide where and how you go down. While you pull off insane tricks on rails, kickers, and half pipes, remember to pose for roaming photographers and camera crews. With enough exposure, you'll find your face on magazine covers and videos and even become an international media superstar.

name: Amazing Grace: What Color is Your Attribute?
summary: “A holy night with no dawn, my dear...” You awaken in a strange town full of art, blanketed in snow, and enclosed by a massive wall. On Christmas, it all burns down—and the girl who loves it most rewinds time to the start of Advent. Find the truth in the loop and paint it on this canvas of a town!

name: American Dad! Apocalypse Soon
summary:
Aliens have invaded Langley Falls! Stan's family is being held hostage and the fate of the world is in your hands. It's time to take charge of the Smith family household, gather an army of Roger clones, and fight to take back Earth and save Stan's family.

Turn the Smith house into your base of operations. Print money, spend Golden Turds, and produce the valuable resources you need to accomplish your mission. Train and equip your Roger clones with America's best arsenal. From baseball bats to makeshift raccoon wands, plasma revolvers to electric machine guns, use all the weapons at your disposal. Once your army is ready, you can take on America's enemies from violent vagabonds to the Antichrist's apostles!

American Dad: Apocalypse Soon is the perfect combination of RPG combat and strategy. Packed with endless hours of fun, this game has something for everyone!

name: Ammo and Oxygen
summary: Adrenaline shooter-roguelike with survival elements and suspense atmosphere. Try to unravel the mysteries, exploring stations, dungeons, canyons, swamps and permafrost, fighting alien creatures.

name: AMseven
summary: You’re a medium performing a séance in an apartment, spotting anomalies to advance time. One mistake resets the clock to midnight. Can you survive the night and reach morning? A horror spot the difference game

name: Amazeing Racer
summary: Race through ever-changing urban mazes in AMazeing Racer! Master the art of navigation while customize your vehicles, go from a struggling driver to racing legend as you assemble the mythical Golden Engine. Every run is different, every corner a challenge, and every drift brings you closer to glory.

name: A Maiden's Serenade
summary: The Mermaid Festival is an annual festival that takes place in the coastal town of Suminoe and on the night of the festival, Takumi meets a girl with a beautiful singing voice. From this chance encounter, Takumi's daily life slowly begins to change. The 7th project by developer, feng.

name: Amazin' George 2
summary: amazin' George 2 is a colourful, stunning 3D HD JRPG Style, turn based RPG featuring the Spacefarer cat, George. Help him rescue his Master from King Rattie and restore the dreamworld of Felina! With huge labyrinths and a gorgeous world to explore, amazin' George 2 is a definitive RPG experience!

name: Amber
summary: Join Amber on a whimsical journey through the 5 kingdoms: Candy, Cake, Story, Rainbow, and Crystal. Spread love, restore balance with Amber Crystals, confront rulers, and set things right using the Mallet, Chocolate Staff, and Bubblegum Wand. Glide with the Rainbow Umbrella!

name: Amedama
summary: Side-scrolling, soul-shifting sandbox action adventure brought to life with a striking new 2D style! With only his soul remaining, Yushin must fight tooth and nail, possessing body after body on a quest to find his sister. With just seven days left until his soul departs, can he save her in time?

name: Amnesia: Rebirth
summary: Amnesia: Rebirth is a new descent into darkness from the creators of the iconic Amnesia series. Set in the desolate landscape of the Algerian desert, the game will focus on new character Tasi Trianon as she sets out on a harrowing journey through devastation and despair, personal terror and pain, while exploring the limits of human resilience.

name: American Eristics
summary: Would you believe one of your friends is a killer? Return home in this 2.5D horror story.

name: Among the Stars
summary: Among the Stars is a competitive 2D rhythm game featuring a minimalist, modern and space-themed visual style, along with an electronic soundtrack. Enjoy regular esports competitions and a built-in level editor to create and share unique levels.

name: Amber Alert Total VR
summary: Step into the shoes of a policeman in "Amber Alert TOTAL VR," a difficult VR horror game. Responding to a late-night call, you find a sinister cult of women abductors. Your mission: rescue a captive girl. Navigate perilous streets, evade cult members, and survive.

name: Amortizer Off-Road
summary:
Amortizer is a casual off-road experience. 
You will find your self in various nature environment, driving 4x4 machine. 
Game does not have any progress. Its made for true off-road lovers. 
You have seven linear maps to complete, without hurry. 
 
Be prepared for mudy,rocky,sandy,snowy environment. 
Prove that you can sustain in all circumstances. 
Sit back and enjoy the bumpy ride. 
After that you can scout around in two open world maps. 
 
Features 
- Realistic Physics 
- Deformable Terrain 
- Various Natural Environments 
- 9 Levels (7 linear levels to complete and 2 medium size open world maps)

name: Am I Nima
summary: Am I Nima is a psychological-horror game where you must convince your mom that you really are her daughter. Combine words together in your brain and use them to talk. Get her to trust you.

name: Amnesia: The Bunker
summary: Amnesia: The Bunker is a first-person horror game set in a desolate WW1 Bunker. Face the oppressing terrors stalking the dark corridors. Search for and use the tools and weapons at your disposal, while keeping the lights on at all costs. Overcome fear, persevere, and make your way out alive.

name: Amerzone: The Explorer's Legacy
summary:
A full remake of a 2001 point-and-click adventure game Amerzone which served as the first game in the later-created Syberia series.

The remake is more like a reimagining of an old classic adventure with new tough puzzles and new challenges.

name: Amygdala
summary: Welcome to the world of Amygdala. Multiple nightmares await you.

name: Amorous Professor Cherry
summary: I'm Kouta Koikawa, and I'm having a problem with my studies. It's not that my classmates' ruckus bothers me, I sit at the front of the room to avoid their antics. The real problem is my social studies professor, Chieri Hase. From the day she started teaching here I haven't been able to keep my eyes off her! She's a rookie teacher, but I'm captivated by every movement of her beautiful body. I can't work up the nerve to confess my feelings - I'm her student, after all, and I'm sure she wouldn't find this sort of forbidden love to be proper... until one day when fate brings us together in an encounter that changes our lives forever.

name: Ambition of the Slimes
summary:
"The RPG game that claims human beings
"Ambition of the Slimes"

The slimes are too weak to be the opponents of the humans.
But, if they utilize their ability of "Claim"
The human that was claimed can be controlled as an ally.

Different kinds of slimes have their own abilities,
you have to choose the proper slime to take over the enemy and consider how to battle with them.

Many tactics can be used in battle and your choice is the key to victory.
Try another method if you cannot defeat your enemy because the slimes are too weak to battle by themselves.

The features of the slimes and their advantages against the enemy will be the key to victory.

Will the weakest slime legion achieve their success?
It shall rely on your strategy as the commander!"

name: A Mirror, Darkly
summary: Explore your surrounds in this short narrative using a novel mechanic to find objects in a mirror's reflection

name: A Most Extraordinary Gnome
summary: As life in the forest becomes harder each year, it's up to one small gnome to keep danger at bay. You have to protect the forest, keep the animals safe and drive away the incoming darkness in this gorgeous, hand crafted paper cut-out world.

name: a Museum of Dubious Splendors
summary:
a Museum of Dubious Splendors, is a storybook from the world of Somewhere.

A quiet game about prosaic objects and spurious histories, it is an irreverent rumination on the nature of an archive and forms of recollection.

name: Amikin Village
summary: Explore the enchanting world of Amiterra, home to the cute yet formidable creatures known as Amikins! Dive into an open-world adventure where you can fight, farm, and build. Collect and evolve Amikins, construct your enchanted base, and embark on thrilling quests blending fantasy and sci-fi!

name: America's Cup Challenge
summary:
The Official America's Cup Sailing Simulation (aka Arnie's America's Cup Challenge, America's Cup Challenge) was an above-average licensed title in its time. Play against the AI or one of your friends. 
 
You can download it here: 
https://www.myabandonware.com/game/the-official-america-s-cup-sailing-simulation-67a

name: Amazing Island
summary:
The 'black evil' has taken over the island, and the Maboo Tribe have called upon you to bring order and outcast the evil that has taken control. To do so, you must create your own creature and train it up, entering it into various competitions against the 'black evil' and working towards the main goal. As the competitions are completed, you will unlock new features to improve your own creature in speed, strength and general looks.

The main reason to do so are the mini games which the monsters can participate in. While those rely on your active gamepad skills (mostly pressing a button as fast as possible with minor variations), the changes of success are dictated by the monster's statistics. So for example a dragon would be beneficial for a flying mini game. Those statistics can be further enhanced with items bought at shops.

Play single and multiplayer battles on the GameCube, or upload your creatures to the Game Boy Advance, taking them on the road to challenge your friends and unlocking unique items and features for the creatures you design.

name: Amnea 28: Dve Vechnosti
summary:
Amnea 28 is a story about a group of young people who go to listen to a course of lectures by a respected professor of psychology. The purpose of the trip is the old hotel "Amnea", which ceased to fulfill its main functions ten years ago, and now serves as a secluded corner for the professor. During the week of studying, each new day the atmosphere is inexorably changing.

Why did the students suddenly start acting strangely? What are they hiding? The main character will have to figure out the secrets of "Amnea", otherwise the walls of the old hotel will not let her leave alive.

name: Amanda the Adventurer
summary: Digging through your attic you found a box set of an old children's TV show, Amanda the Adventurer, starring a brave girl named Amanda and a cowardly sheep named Wooly. You don't recall any specific episodes or characters in the show. Or what happens in the show exactly. Or much about it at all come to think about it, but it still feels strangely familiar. Curiosity takes hold and you decide to watch the tapes and let horror nostalgia take you back to a simpler age.

name: Amaze
summary: Maze is a straight-forward and surprisingly-difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze.

name: AM
summary: Hop into the driver's seat and prepare for anything as you navigate a vast network of rural roads in search of salvation. AM is a high-speed horror game that keeps you on the edge of your seat—and your foot on the gas—as you race to leave the nightmares of an abandoned world in your rearview.

name: Amazing Weekend 2: Search and Relax - Collector's Edition
summary: "Amazing Weekend 2 - Search and Relax 2 Collector's Edition" is a great new hidden object game. Experience hiking, horseback riding, and boating provide unforgettable escapes from the rush and bustle of city life. Discover all of the hidden objects and complete loads of challenging mini-games.

name: Amazing Weekend 4: Search and Relaxed - Collector's Edition
summary: Picturesque locations are waiting for you, filled with an atmosphere of relaxation.

name: Amsilvania Castle
summary:
AMSILVANIA CASTLE es un divertido juego de aventuras con magníficos gráficos, en el que Vd. participa activamente. 
 
Su objetivo es conseguir el mayor número de riquezas que encierra el Castillo de Amsilvania. Para ello debe recorrer las diferentes habitaciones del tenebroso castillo (150 en total), hasta llegar a la gran cámara arisi, donde los sueños de cualquier buscador de tesoros pueden hacerse realidad. 
 
Pero no crea que le será fácil. Un gran número de peligros acechan constantemente: pozos ocultos, habitaciones oscuras, escorpiones, mazmorras... De todos ellos podrá escapar si ha realizado las compras oportunas antes de empezar el difícil trayecto. Dispone de cuerdas para subir de los abruptos pozos, antídotos contra el mortal veneno de los escorpiones... (A esta opción puede acceder en cualquier momento del juego). 
 
Todavía nadie ha logrado salir victorioso de esta difícil misión. 
 
¡Sea Vd. el primero y descubra los secretos del Castillo de Amsilvania! 
 
 
INDICACIONES 
 
Para facilitarle la tarea, le presentamos una lista de las teclas que necesita para conseguir su objetivo: 
 
LETRA - FUNCIÓN - CONDICIONES 
FLECHAS - Mover al aventurero - (+ SHIFT = Movimiento Rápido) 
0 - Vaciar las manos 
1 - Llave de hierro - Manos vacías. Llave ya encontrada. 
2 - Llave de oro 
3 - Alicates - Manos vacías. Haberlos comprado. 
4 - Linterna - Manos vacías. Tener pilas. 
5 - Frasco energético - Manos vacías. Tener alguno. 
6 - Antídoto anti-escorpión - Manos vacías. Haber comprado. 
A - Abrir rejas y... - Llave en mano. 
B - Coger objeto - Manos vacías. Estar en posición. 
C - Cuerda (dentro del pozo) - Tener cuerdas compradas. 
S - Subir (dentro del pozo) - Haber puesto antes la cuerda. 
F - Forzar la tapa del cofre - Tener alicates en mano. 
M - Abandonar juego - Situación desesperada. 
B - Balace provisional - Cambiar de habitación. 
 
La opción B permite ver la cantidad de objetos de que se dispone. Para utilizarla es preciso pulsar la tecla B, y al salir de la habitación aparecerá el balance. 
 
En ocasiones, al abrir una reja o un cofre, aparecerá el mensaje "no se abre". Insista hasta que el óxido desaparezca de las bisagras.

name: Amnyam
summary: “Aim for the top with your Mouse Aim Skill!” "AMNYAM” is a platform game in which you climb to the top and aim for the summit with your ‘Mouse Aim Skill’. It supports multiplay! With three difficulty settings, it's suitable for everyone from mouse beginners to aiming experts.

name: Amaze Dark Times
summary: aMAZE Dark Times is a straightforward and surprisingly-difficult celebration of the simple beauty of the maze with cool soundtrack and timer!

name: Amid Evil
summary: Once branded a heretic. Now you have been chosen. Reclaim our sacred weapons. Take back our ancestral lands. If you can stand... Amid Evil.

name: A Magical High School Girl
summary: A Magical High School Girl is an isometric grid-based turn-based roguelike RPG. However, unlike normal roguelikes, the HP system, experience system, levels, UI, and almost everything else has been reimagined to fit the theme of the game. And most of all this is the first roguelike to offer an enjoyable experience for even casual players. But this game has many layers, and even roguelike veterans will have something to look forward to in the diverse systems this game has to offer. The same combination of words will always create the same spell, so tell your friends about the spells you discover and use the knowledge you've hoarded to beat others in time attack mode. There's all sorts of ways to play!

name: Among The Light
summary: Among the Light is a horror game about a girl after experiencing trauma has to fight off monsters through out the night, grab your trusty flashlight and hopefully you can survive “Among The Light”.

name: Amatsuki Mahjong
summary: Amatsuki Mahjong is a ACG style mahjong game that offers real-time multiplayer online matches. It features four styles of mahjong: Japanese, Sichuan, Taiwanese, and Hong Kong Mahjong. Enjoy a variety of play styles tailored to your preferences.

name: Amphora Hell
summary:
"My masterpiece..."
The Kilnmaster strokes his unkempt red beard as he observes the fruit of his labor.
The first 'legged amphora', an idea so profound and arresting that he is sure to become the most respected potter in the realm within days.

But suddenly, his eyes narrow;
"There's a dent, an imperfection! This work is nothing but junk. I'll shatter ya, you lousy pot!"
The terrified amphora swiftly dashes out of the strike's way.
Enraged, The Kilnmaster sends his autonomous mallets after it.
"No evidence of my failure must remain. Prepare to be scrapped!

Can you survive for the entire duration of my goofy ass fl studio beat and escape?
Run, little amphora!

name: America's Army: Proving Grounds
summary: America’s Army: Proving Grounds is the official game of the U.S. Army and part of the highly acclaimed America’s Army game series. This free military game focuses on small unit tactical maneuvers and puts you to the test in new America’s Army maps as well as AA fan favorites Hospital and Bridge.

name: Amnesia: Memories
summary:
Amnesia: Memories (known in Japan as AMNESIA V Edition) is a Japanese otome visual novel game. The game is a remaster of the original first game in Amnesia series, released on the Playstation Portable. Like other otome games, players will be controlling the main female character and find her love interest from various male characters from the game.

The game starts when the female main character wakes up without any memory of her past or who she is. With the help of Orion, a mysterious gentleman who appears to be in her side when she wakes up, they venture the world to find her lost memory. During their journey, the female protagonist receives a call from another man whom she might know but can’t remember.

name: American Fugitive
summary: Set in a sleepy American country town in the 1980s, American Fugitive invites you to play as Will Riley. You're no angel, but you're not a killer. Yet the cold-blooded murder of your dad is the crime they've locked you up for. Fuelled by grief and a burning desire for vengeance, you must break out of jail to find the real culprit. It's payback time.

name: Amane Switch
summary: Is there truly such a thing...as a happy ending? Amane Switch is a visual novel game remake updated for international audiences. An adventure game themed around rain, yandere characters, and strange abnormalities.

name: Amazing Cultivation Simulator
summary: The Amazing Cultivation Simulator is a China fairy-tale style simulation game with Roguelike and survival elements, and classic China culture background.

name: American McGee's Alice
summary: Shortly after her second adventure, Through the Looking-Glass, Alice's house is burnt down by an accidental fire, killing her family and leaving her as the only survivor. As time progresses Alice loses touch with reality. She is institutionalized in Rutledge Asylum, where she is observed and treated by Dr. Heironymous Wilson. Alice's only possession in Rutledge is a stuffed rabbit. Ten years after Alice was committed to Rutledge, she finds herself sucked back into a Wonderland that has been twisted by her own broken mind. The White Rabbit summons Alice to aid a radically altered Wonderland, which became a twisted version of itself as it came under the horrible rule of the Queen of Hearts. The Cheshire Cat serves as Alice's companion throughout the game, frequently appearing to guide her with cryptic comments.

name: American Conquest: Fight Back
summary:
Three centuries of war continue with frantic combat and desperate power struggles raging across the American continent. The Spanish press the attack in the Yucatan against the fierce Maya and Aztec nations. The Germans put all their efforts into finding the legendary El Dorado. The Pontiac Uprising ends in a terrifying bloodbath between Native Americans and the British. And the Russians will do anything to conquer Alaska at the cost of the Haida. Lead armies of thousands of troops to victory in large-scale battles in 10 missions.

Both games are a real treat for any strategy fan. But this is not a standard RTS, there is no simple build-send-and-forget here because even the biggest army can be defeated by a well coordinated, but relatively small force. Just like the old proverb says: “An army of sheep led by a lion would defeat an army of lions led by a sheep.”

name: American Theft 80s
summary: It's the 80s. Steal vhs players, tapes, classic cars, and if you get caught, outrun the police!

name: American Conquest
summary: American Conquest: In the year 1492, travel to America as Christopher Columbus and ignite the fire that will fan 300 years of heated battles for land, riches, and freedom. In eight historical campaigns spanning 42 missions, you will take on the roles of great legends such as Francisco Pizarro and George Washington. Secure new technologies, unique weaponry, and improved fighting units, but also master the delicate world of diplomacy. Play with fire! Conquer America.

name: Amazing Pets Bundle
summary: Enjoy the Amazing Pets Bundle packed with 4 cute games filled with coziness and wholessomes!

name: Amertis
summary: A point-and-click adventure game.

name: Amazing Wizard
summary: Amazing Wizard is an XNA community game

name: Amateurs
summary: Sleepy Tom and Lights team up to bring you Amateurs the game!

name: AmeriDarts
summary: Released in 1989 from Ameri, AmeriDarts is a trackball controlled darts game featuring Shootout, Flash, 301, High Score and Cricket variations.

name: Amaze! Relax Edition
summary:
Lets pop & move the ball and paint - you’ve got to color and paint your way across the AMAZE maze puzzles.

Watch out! AMAZE gets harder as you play, color and paint the maze, and fill in puzzles!

Painting the maze puzzles sounds easy, but you have to be super strategic to color and fill every square.

name: American Marksman
summary:
American Marksman - the ultimate hunting and outdoor adventure game! Explore vast, open landscapes and modify the terrain to suit your hunting needs.

Join forces with other players in multiplayer and hunt together, or take a break and roleplay with your friends - set up camp, explore the wilderness, and go off-roading.

Purchase your own land in different regions of the country and invite friends to join you on your outdoor adventures. With realistic graphics and intense gameplay, American Marksman will take you on the ultimate outdoor experience.

name: Amazing Runner
summary:
Amazing Runner is a sleek and accessible endless-runner game set in a vibrant, futuristic universe. Players dash through dynamic tracks, leaping and sliding to evade obstacles, and enjoy standout mechanics like wall and ceiling running, alongside swirling corkscrew sections that demand precise circular swipes. With responsive controls and a variety of power-ups and avatars, the gameplay remains engaging and polished throughout.

Critics generally considered the game "mixed or average": appreciated for its fun execution and inventive touches, yet seen as somewhat derivative compared to genre-defining titles.

name: Among the Monolyths
summary: A short game about solving puzzles to heal.

name: A Moment of a Self Portrait
summary: Essentially, this twine game is an OCD simulator, and allows you to walk a day in my shoes.

name: Amma: Chronicles of Lost Stars
summary:
Inspired by the mythology and culture of the Dogon, an ethnic indigenous group in Mali, Amma: Chronicles of Lost Stars is an Afrofantasy action-adventure role-playing game with a focus on story and exploration.

The central character in the game is Aya, a teenage weaver from the village of Jûlaya who sees her destiny shift radically when she is chosen by God Nommo as the Guardian to prevent the destruction of the world.

Amma: Chronicles of Lost Stars will feature a diverse set of locations, characters, demons, and bosses, with strategic, dynamic combat that fuses magic, martial arts, and melee weapons.

name: Ami Solitaire
summary: This game is a standard solitaire game that comes by default with Windows but cards show hentai pictures of Sailormercury (Ami Mizuno) instead (some ones show pictures of Ami + Mako also).

name: America Oudan Ultra Quiz: Part 3
summary: America Oudan Ultra Quiz Part 3 is a Miscellaneous game, published by Tomy Corporation, which was released in Japan in 1992.

name: Amen Jesus Flap
summary: Flappy Bird clone starring Jesus of Nazareth

name: Amazing Drawing: Coloring Book Simulator
summary: You are immersed in a world of creativity and self-expression, where everyone can become a real artist in the colouring book simulator!

name: American Patriots: Boston Tea Party
summary: Take Boston or die for freedom!

name: Amazing Quest
summary: Victorious at last, you now need to get yourself and your fleet back home. Decide as if it all depends on you, trust as if it all depends on the gods, and you will have an amazing quest...

name: Amendium
summary: Join Axel and Lance in a full-scale quest to discover what happened to the planet they find themselves on. Journey through 3 seas and into many dungeons in search of answers as both Axel and Lance.

name: Amnon's Beginning
summary: A battle that commends for the mind, will the mind be successful or unsuccessful in maintaining it's stability? Build your settlement and fight off the invader of this spiritual realm with real-time strategy.

name: AMF Bowling Pinbusters!
summary: AMF Bowling Pinbusters! is a bowling sports-based video game. It was released on Wii on November 20, 2007 and was released in America on the Nintendo DS on June 10, 2008.

name: Amalgamy
summary: Blend into the crowd, track down your friends and win the game.

name: American University Life
summary: Take the role of first year student Skye in his first week of college on a remote getaway. Meet his four other roommates as they learn to live together, set boundaries, and engage in their lifestyle.

name: Amaranthine Voyage: The Shadow of Torment HD
American Truck Traffic Racer: Highway Racing
Amos Green's Final Repose
summary: Amos Green's Final Repose is the 17th adventure of Carol Reed by MDNA, a young woman from England living in Sweden. Carol is contacted by her best friend Stina, because her contact infos were found on a dead man, whose body was discovered in a newly reopened part of a natural reserve. She doesn't know him, so Carol is tasked to find the connection...

name: Amstrad Compilation Disk Spectrum Plus 3
summary:
This compilation includes:

- Mailstrom
- N.O.M.A.D.
- Gift from the Gods
- Cosmic Wartoad
- Daley Thompson's Super-Test

name: American Tag-Team Wrestling
summary:
Released at a budget price around the peak of the WWF's original popularity, the twist in this wrestling game is the tag-team nature of competition. Each player selects two wrestlers from those on offer, and when the one in the ring is weakened he can go to the edge of the ring and tag his team-mate, who then enters the ring and allows the other to recover.

You can either play individual matches (for one or two players) or a full tournament, with three rounds of variable length. There is no joystick-waggling in the control system, with a variety of kicks, throws and punches on offer using simple joystick motions. Once the players are close together they grapple - this gives you a chance to lift and then piledrive your opponent.

name: Amazing Hidden Object Games 3 Pack: Paranormal Mysteries
summary:
Amazing Hidden Object Games 3 Pack: Paranormal Mysteries includes;
- Immortal Lovers,
- Ghost Whisperer Forgotten Toys and
- Sinister City

name: Amazin' George 2: Digital Deluxe
summary: More cat and maze and JRPG fun! We've updated George and his friend's appearence to look even cuter and more realistic than ever.

name: Amaemi: Longing for you
summary:
The protagonist, Nabeshima Tatsuya, was a world-renowned painter.

However, after a certain incident, he disappeared from the public eye.
Now as a social studies teacher, he spends his days away from the art world.

He lives in seclusion with his cat in his social studies preparation room, which is his own residence, away from the public eye.
However, with the arrival of the new school semester, a new wind begins to blow.

Kusunoki Iroha, an attractive girl who adores Tatsuya.

Kurusu Sakuya, the most talented girl in the school, who mysteriously invites Tatsuya to the school;

and Akebi Saki, the daughter of Tatsuya's former teacher.

A life of dullness, like being dead inside while living.
Now it is being colored in gorgeous and vibrant colors by the three girls.

name: Ambushed
summary: Play with your team and do your best!

name: Amazing Cat Saves the World From Space Blobs
summary: Amazing Cat Saves the World From Space Blobs is a puzzle game about a cat who must fight space blobs.

name: Amazing Birds Hunter
summary: Have you ever wondered what it would be like to be an expert bird hunter. turkey hunting, wing shooting are just few clicks away. Amazing bird hunter is a game of timing and patience. Become the amazing bird hunter you always wanted to be and use your fingers to the precision to shoot all the birds.

name: Ambush
summary: Ambush is a party game up to 2-8 players in local multiplayer. Stay hidden in a crowd, spot players among the AIs, and slice them up with your freshly sharpened katana. Strategy and violence will be part of the game.

name: A Mage Reborn
summary: Walk the path of a legendary mage, combining four different schools of magic to devastating effects.

name: Ambienz
summary: Challenge your state of mind as you fly through simple and complex procedurally generated spaces in search of gems to collect.

name: Amaranthine Voyage: The Shadow of Torment
summary: A hidden object puzzle adventure game.

name: AMG
summary: Doomsday is a sci-fi interstellar war strategy online game.

name: A Maldição da Vila Sinistra
summary: A Maldição da Vila Sinistra is a text-based adventure developed by PISC where you need to uncover an abandoned village.

name: American Dream
summary:
The player must earn money in order to become the wealthiest gambler in the world. The game, set in New York City, is considered a spin-off from the Pachio-kun franchise. Al Capone has a cameo role in this game even though he lived about one thousand miles to the west (Chicago) in real life.
Roads, taxis and automobiles are not portrayed in the game. However, a black limousine that escorts the player from the air force base to the final casino is portrayed as driving on grass. This is in direct opposition to the real New York City where the majority of the surface is concrete (either as roads, parking lots, or as foundations for the buildings). Only parks and some older residential districts use grass in their design in the real world. Buildings are either shown as dilapidated tenements, shiny towers, or as flashy casinos.

name: A Messenger Adventure
summary: A short Zork inspired piece of interactive fiction played with a chatbot through Facebook Messenger.

name: Amor Fati
summary: A feel-good micro game about what can be created from nothing

name: Amazing Pyramids: Rebirth
summary: Amazing Pyramids are back! Lead a group of scientists through addicting word adventures! Play now and solve intricate word puzzles to unravel the secrets of an ancient city! Use your wits and vocabulary to survive the blistering sun!

name: Ambient Channels: Zanfium Tower - Lounge
summary: In Zanfium Tower - Lounge, you'll find a comfortable modern environment with a kitchen and lounge with the normal Ambient Channels modes, plus additional media abilities, such as watching videos on one of the TVs and multiplayer w/voice chat. You can play Tower Lounge for free in Ambient Channels

name: Among Stars and Robots
summary: Lead Cubot through over 50 challenging puzzles using the commands at your disposal without getting stuck in a loop!

name: Amarillo Slim's 7 Card Stud
summary: The game is a poker simulation featuring only one kind of variety: 7 Card Stud. You can play against two to seven computer opponents chosen out of fifteen different personalities and even with digitized voices.

name: Amazing Crime Rope Stickman
summary: Explore the big city, go off-roading in the mountains, steal and drive supercars, shoot guns and more in this open world game.

name: Ambient Channels: Abandoned Town - Farmhouse
summary: In the 'Abandoned Town' series, a man-made environmental disaster has transformed a once quaint town into a ghost town. In the 'Farmhouse' episode you explore an abandoned farmhouse where the contents still remain but the people are long gone. Discover family belongings in the hidden objects game.

name: Ambient Channels: Desolate Space - Contaminated Vessel
summary: In the 'Desolate Space' series, humans have left behind space facilities and locations that are no longer habitable. In the 'Contaminated Vessel' episode you make your way through an abandoned spacecraft that has been contaminated with an unknown organism.

name: Amogus TD 2: Defense of the Sus
summary: Sussy tower defense game with unlimited ways to play the game. Play with unique towers and upgrade them to create perfect defense. Master every map and become the greatest sussy commander.

name: Among Ass: Trilogy
summary: Local party or single player game about teamwork and killing with forbidden items!

name: American Heroes BF 92 Extra Version
summary: Street Fighter fan game.

name: Among Thorns
summary:
In a world suffering with a technological plague, Cora Bry is recruited for a shady job. A short point and click adventure game by Matt Frith.

Originally designed and created in 1 month for the Monthy AGS competition on the AGS forums.

name: Amongst the Neon Lights
summary: Dodge bullets like your life depends on it! Help Royal to fight against an evil being sending bullets and beams at you to the beat.
